alert.note: Alert for Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 5:18AM CDT until April 20 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN ATCHISON...BUCHANAN...CLINTON...GENTRY...NORTHERN PLATTE...ANDREW AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 517 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Stanberry to near Union Star to near Clarksdale to 6 miles east of Rushville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Cameron, Savannah, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Albany, Gower, Elwood, Stanberry, Maysville, Country Club Villa, Country Club, King City, Stewartsville, Agency, Trimble, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point and Union Star. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 52 and 55. Interstate 29 between mile markers 26 and 59. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 14. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Andrew; Buchanan; Clinton; DeKalb; Gentry; Platte
